Ideally located within walking distance to the Glenburvie Train Station, Napier Street shops and Mt Alexander Road trams, this beautifully updated unit is the epitome of comfort, connection and class.
High ceilings and hardwood flooring welcomes you through the front door and work your way through a conducive single level layout.
A spacious open plan living and dining area is the ideal place to entertain or just sit and relax with family and friends in split-system air-conditioned comfort.
From here an updated central kitchen with stainless steel appliances including built-in gas cooking, an under bench oven and range hood is easily accessible, as is the main bathroom which matches the modern tones enjoyed throughout and features a separate shower and inset bath.
Two carpeted bedrooms have built-in robes and provide ample accommodation, the master incorporating its own individual split-system air-conditioning system.
A stand-alone laundry connects to a perfectly private low-maintenance courtyard with room for the barbecue and outdoor furniture and also provides access to a convenient storage room.
With the addition of a separate study/home office, gas ducted heating and a lock up garage, this single level sensation will impress from beginning to end.
In an unquestionable location, close to Essendon Grammar and Essendon Primary School, with proximity to Mt Alexander Road shops, cafes, restaurants and services, plus with great connection to the Moonee Ponds Shopping Centre, Pascoe Vale Road, Citylink and Melbourne's Tullamarine Airport.
